name: The Ball Boy - Wimbledon Edition
description:
ADVISORY: This game is really QUICK and really ADDICTIVE. The Ball Boy - Wimbledon Edition is quickly becoming a SMASH

Gameplay:
The Tennis Players are going crazy and you need to pick up all the balls as quickly as possible - Make sure to collect the strawberries and cream as they're worth 5 points but don't slip up on the bananas 'cos they'll cost you 10!!
All you do to control is use two fingers to control the ball boy's hands.
Do you think you have what it takes to become Wimbledon's Best Ball Boy??!!
